Batik Maven Plugin

  • Organizational POM
  • Coding standards
  • Commons testing
  • Java archetype
  • Other projects

batik:rasterizer

Full name:

net.trajano.mojo:batik-maven-plugin:1.1.0-SNAPSHOT:rasterizer

Description:

Executes the Batik rasterizer.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • The goal is thread-safe and supports parallel builds.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-resources.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
destDir File - The directory to write the rasterized SVG files.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/generated-resources/batik.
mimeType String - The MIME type of file to convert to. Valid values are image/png, image/jpeg, image/tiff and application/pdf.
Default value is: image/png.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
failOnError boolean - Fail on error. Otherwise it will continue to the next file.
Default value is: true.
height float - In less than or equal to zero, the height is not constrained on the output image.
Default value is: -1.
maxHeight float - If less than or equal to zero, the maximum height does not have any effect on the output image.
Default value is: -1.
maxWidth float - If less than or equal to zero, the maximum width does not have any effect on the output image.
Default value is: -1.
svgResources List - A list of SVG resources to import. Resource is used instead of FileSet to allow for filtering in the future. The default is: 
<svgResources>
    <resource>
        <directory>${basedir}/src/main/svg</directory>
        <filtering>false</filtering>
        <includes>
            <include>**\/\*.svg</include>
        </includes>
        <excludes>
        </excludes>
    </resources>
</svgResources>

width float - In less than or equal to zero, the width is not constrained on the output image.
Default value is: -1.

Parameter Details

destDir:

The directory to write the rasterized SVG files.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/generated-resources/batik

failOnError:

Fail on error. Otherwise it will continue to the next file.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: true

height:

In less than or equal to zero, the height is not constrained on the output image.
  • Type: float
  • Required: No
  • Default: -1

maxHeight:

If less than or equal to zero, the maximum height does not have any effect on the output image.
  • Type: float
  • Required: No
  • Default: -1

maxWidth:

If less than or equal to zero, the maximum width does not have any effect on the output image.
  • Type: float
  • Required: No
  • Default: -1

mimeType:

The MIME type of file to convert to. Valid values are image/png, image/jpeg, image/tiff and application/pdf.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: image/png

svgResources:

A list of SVG resources to import. Resource is used instead of FileSet to allow for filtering in the future. The default is: 
<svgResources>
    <resource>
        <directory>${basedir}/src/main/svg</directory>
        <filtering>false</filtering>
        <includes>
            <include>**\/\*.svg</include>
        </includes>
        <excludes>
        </excludes>
    </resources>
</svgResources>
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: No

width:

In less than or equal to zero, the width is not constrained on the output image.
  • Type: float
  • Required: No
  • Default: -1

Version: 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT
